question: when does rick and morty play on tv
vanilla_rag_result: "Rick and Morty" originally aired on Sundays at 11:30 p.m. EST on Adult Swim during its third season. The show has also been aired on other dates and times, such as Season 2 starting on April 27, 2019, on E4. However, the specific time may vary depending on the season and the network.
